left_text: Arolia absent; ﬁrst ﬂagellar segment shorter than scape; labrum with transverse preapical ridge, often broken; T2 with lateral gradulus reaching about middle of exposed part of tergum
right_text: Arolia present; ﬁrst ﬂagellar segment as long as or usually longer than scape; labrum without transverse preapical ridge; T2 with lateral gradulus usually strong and reaching posterior marginal zone of tergum
